Name: Upper limb dystonia, cervical dystonia and healthy controls dataset
Acknowledgments: We thank FAPESP, CNPq and CAPES foundation for the support, and all participating center of the study: Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, the Universidade Federal de São Paulo, and the Hospital Servidor Público Estadual. We also thank all participants of our study.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite this paper (link will be added after acceptance by the journal)
EthicsApprovals: The study was approved by the Institutional Review Boards of all participating centers (Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, Hospital do Servidor Público Estadual, and Universidade Federal de São Paulo), and all subjects provided written informed consent prior to participation.
